::DarkMouse::
She sighed and looked at the ark. "Doesn't it strike anyone as odd 
the since the most important ship in history has been blown to scrap, 
and no maximals around the sacred rubble at all." She looked around. 
She then looked at Destructor. "OK, we're here, at the ark as it now 
stands, and where are the maximals whose base this is?  I don't get 
it. I would think they would be sworming over thier base like bees on 
a hive."  She walked over and stood next to Destructor. "Well, if 
something is going to happen, this little mouse is staying with the 
biggest snd strongest bot she knows."  She didn't look at Destructor, 
she was too busy looking around for signs of life.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  "Mine" desrtuctor said...."And his.." his head motioned towards 
Magnus. 
> Magnus glowed from the oracal swirving around him. 
>   "Let us wait for the maximals. We still need them."
